DOC.brief_summary: A study to asses the safety and efficacy of MK0429 in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Proof of Concept (Bone Resorption/Bone Mineral Density) Study (0429-005)
DOC.criteria: Person is a women with osteoporosis who is unwilling or unable to take other treatments for osteoporosis Person has had a previous fracture Person has rheumatoid arthritis. Person has has certain types of cancer Person has donated blood or has been in another investigational study within the last 4 weeks
